game.name: Where Rabbits 兔子在哪里
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Find 100 Rabbits. A carefully hand drawn scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Find 100 Rabbits. A carefully hand drawn scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

reviewHighlights.text: 숨은 토끼 찾기. 토끼처럼 생긴 건 죄다 해당함. [spoiler]벽에 있는 문양도 토끼처럼 생겼으면 토끼 맞음.[/spoiler]
